name: Legacy (Geru Games)
description:
Controls

Mouse Point, Click, and Hold to move around.

R to restart

Q to return to level select

You can also press D, E, and L at the same time to clear your data.  Although you probably don't want to do this, and frankly it won't benefit you.

Gameplay

This is legacy, my entry for Weekly Game Jame 115: Life is Short.  Point, click, and hold to move your character around.  However, you only have 3 seconds to live!  Do not fret, as your successors can carry out the goal you were trying to accomplish. 

 Can you make it through all ten levels? (Ha of course you can, this game is fairly easy, I think...)

Post Mortem

I wish I was able to spend more time on the Level Design and Sounds.  This was my first attempt at making a puzzle game so I can't say I'm too happy with the results.  I wasn't feeling 100% inspired by the theme, but I think it turned out all right.

As for the amount of content, originally I was going to make an Arcade game and I was pretty far into that when I decided to swap ideas, so I wasn't able to pump out as many levels as I would've wanted.  There was also some complications with actually building the game and I spent 2 hours figuring out what was wrong.
